insights.summary: Your portfolio is heavily weighted in tech with 78.3% exposure (NVDA 65.1% + AAPL 13.2%). This creates significant sector concentration risk. While this aligns with your aggressive growth mandate, consider diversifying into other sectors for better risk management.

concentration_risk.message: NVDA represents 65.1% of portfolio - significant single-stock risk

recommendations: Consider adding healthcare, financials, or consumer staples for diversification
Increase portfolio to 5-10 holdings for better diversification (currently 3)
Trim largest position and redistribute to reduce single-stock risk
strengths: Tech concentration aligns well with aggressive growth mandate
Adequate number of holdings (3) provides some diversification
risks: High tech sector correlation - vulnerable to sector-wide downturns
Single-stock risk: largest position is 65.1% of portfolio
Small portfolio size may limit diversification opportunities
